### Question 1

$[y|a] = Bern(a)$

$[a] = Beta(\alpha, \beta)$

$[a|y] = {[y|a][a]}$

$MH = \frac{[y|a][a]}{[y|a.old][a.old]}$

``` {r}
set.seed(1)
a.init <- 0.5
K <- 5000000

samples <- matrix(,K,1)
samples[1,] <- a.init

for (i in 2:K){
  a.try <- runif(1)
  a.old <- samples[i-1,]
  mh <-a.try/a.old
  #Decide if keep the value
  keep <- ifelse(mh>1, 1, rbinom(1,1,mh)) 
  samples[i,] <- ifelse(keep==1, a.try, a.old)
}
```
